Log4cxx Support

log4cxx user support is provided via the log4cxx-user@logging.apache.org mailing list. Please search mailing list archives and bug tracker before posting. The development mailing lists are described in the contributing topic.

Mailing List Archives

log4cxx-user@logging.apache.org is archived at MARC, GMANE, and apache.org (mod_mbox, eyebrowse).

Subscribe

Subscribe to either the list or to the digest list:

  • To subscribe to this list send an e-mail to
    log4cxx-user-subscribe@logging.apache.org.

  • To subscribe to the digest list sent an e-mail to
    log4cxx-user-digest-subscribe@logging.apache.org.

Unsubscribe

To unsubscribe send an email to the relevant email address:

  • To unsubscribe from this list send an e-mail to
    log4cxx-user-unsubscribe@logging.apache.org.

  • To unsubscribe from the digest list sent an e-mail to
    log4cxx-user-digest-unsubscribe@logging.apache.org.

Posting

Please have a quick read through the guidelines, thanks.

To prevent spam, we require you to be subscribed to the list before posting to it.

Post a message to the list by sending mail to log4cxx-user@logging.apache.org. Message containing attachments are not accepted.

To check for known bugs, report new ones or submit a patch, use the log4cxx bug tracker.
